overview: Scott Holcombe is co-founder and Chief Technical Officer for RoyaltyShare, responsible for all aspects of architecture, design and development of the company’s state-of-the-art royalty processing system. Holcombe has more than 15 years of software development experience. Prior to joining Royaltyshare, he served as VP of Engineering for eMusic, a leading music subscription service and as a senior Software Developer at Vivendi Universal where he was responsible for the ongoing development of Vivendi’s music and media websites, including eMusic.com, MP3.com, and rollingstone.com. Holcombe’s career also includes senior development roles with NeoPoint, HNC Software and Mistix/Teleseat.
